name: latref
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c3, c1), wcel(c0, cpo))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c1[c3]c1, c0 ∈ Poset)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cpo))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Lat → c0 ∈ Poset)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cpo))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Lat → c0 ∈ Poset)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))

comment: A lattice ordering is reflexive. ( ~ ssid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2011.)
